column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I'm Extremely disappointed with my experience tonight. I'm a dedicated Jinya Costumer and I love the ramen
column2: but tonight I was let down. I asked for mild chicken ramen with a seasoned egg and extra noodles. I paid extra for both resulting in a $15+ bill. My food was ordered to-go so once I got home and checked my meal
column3: there was no egg and there was no extra noodles. To top it all off
column4: there was barely any broth at all and only two tiny slices of chicken.
